name: Brickerino
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Use left click to launch the ball.

Drag your mouse to control the paddle.

Use right click to launch a FIREBALL.

But be careful with your mana ;)

HOW TO WIN

Break a key brick (with your ball or a fireball!) to open the door and launch your ball in the opened door to finish a level!

EDIT THE LEVELS

You can edit all the levels to model them as you wish using the integrated level editor!

Enjoy :)
